entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SegFault while trying to Copy native test components in monointerpreter test run build #67405
  • Incorrect JsonException.Path when using non-leaf custom JsonConverters #67403
  • HttpClient crashes android app when trimmed #67402
    6.0.x
  • Methods JITed during startup #67398
  • [API Proposal]: Task.WhenAll(... CancellationToken) #67392
  • `IServiceScopeFactory` is Documented Assumed to be a Singleton #67391
  • Support custom type generated marshalling on prior to net7 tfms #67390
  • [API Proposal]: Boolean format strings #67388
  • Packages that depended on the latest version of System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe regressed and use a very old version of Unsafe now #67380
    7.0.0
  • [QUIC] Adopt msquic generated interop layer #67377
    7.0.0
  • [ARM64] Consider using LDAPR to implement volatile reads when instruction is available. #67374
    7.0.0
  • Test failure Interop\\IJW\\CopyConstructorMarshaler\\CopyConstructorMarshaler\\CopyConstructorMarshaler.cmd #67372
  • DataContract and derived types missing Equals implementation #67371

Closed

  • TryAdd* extensions compare based on service, not implementation #67404
  • [Apple ARM64] dotnet crashing when debugging in .NET 7 (7.0.100-preview.2.22101.4) #65341
    7.0.0
  • My Razor server fails to start with openssl3 #67375
    Future
  • VS debugger hangs when clicking on any button in WinformsControlsTest #65664
    7.0.0
  • ChainedConfigurationProvider.GetChildKeys is inefficient #62510
    7.0.0
  • QUIC: Wrong exception for Open*Stream after connection is closed #56133
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: [ReadOnly]Span<T>.CreateUnsafe(ref T, int) for compiler-tracked, arbitrary length spans #67242
  • Cannot deserialize an immutable collection #67361
  • IP protocol implementations which work in Windows do not work in Linux #67303
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.SocketsHttpHandler_HttpClientHandler_Cancellation_Test_Http2.Expect100Continue_WaitsExpectedPeriodOfTimeBeforeSendingContent #66632
    7.0.0
  • Android test failed with DEVICE_NOT_FOUND #67032
  • CreateXHarnessAppleWorkItems task failed unexpectedly when building iOS arm64 AllSubsets_Mono #67349
  • MissingMethodException: The method 'System.Void System.IO.Packaging.Package::.cctor()' has no implementation. #67079
  • Test failure: GetResponseAsync_UseDefaultCredentials_ExpectSuccess #58349
    Future
  • Bounds checks on array/span not eliminated after length check #10596
    Future
  • Unrecognized X509VerifyStatusCode:Interop+Crypto+X509VerifyStatusCode on RHEL 9/OpenSSL 3.0 #67304
  • Review Apple Silicon PAL tests disabled by #47919 #48783
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Removed the hard heap limit heap balancing logic for regions + UOH and fixed infinite retries in case at the LOH boundary #67406
    area-GC-coreclr
  • More XARCH `PUTARG_STK` CQ improvements #67400
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix a thread pool test #67399
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Bump Intellisense to Preview2 #67396
    documentation, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • Optimize `ValueNumStore::GetVNFunc` #67395
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Infra fixes for bugs uncovered by testing of the JIT/Methodical merged tests #67393
    area-Infrastructure
  • More precise writebarrier for regions #67389
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Use MemoryMappedFileAccess.Read when searching a memory mapped file #67386
    area-HostModel, community-contribution
  • Bring back direct dependencies on System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe for other tfms than net7.0 #67385
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • [arm64] Add RCPC ISA (8.3+) and use ldap for volatile reads #67384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [QUIC] Update to msquic 2 #67383
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Quic
  • First commit for ppc64le support #67378
    area-Build-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Some test fixes #67373
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix IsPrefix and IsSuffix with ignored characters #67370
    area-System.Globalization, 7.0.0

Merged

  • Add RemoteExecutor check in TestWaitForExitValidation #67397
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process
  • Load R2R images on osx-arm64 according to Apple's guidelines #67118
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Makes GetChildKeys more efficient #67186
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Fix ordering in default interface method lookup #67379
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Memory containment for `FIELD_LIST` operands on x86 #65803
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Mark architecture-specific tests as requiring process isolation #67394
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix missing side effect flags on HWI nodes #67206
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Account for global stores in hoisting properly #67213
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix Wrong exception for Open*Stream after connection is closed #67342
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Port Access violation occurring in System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ForestTrustRelationshipInformation fix from .netfx to .net-core #66726
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • [mono][llvm] Fix an assert with --aot=llvmonly and -O=gsharedvt. #67357
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Minor refactoring in MarshallingAttributeInfoParser #67325
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Always commit X.509 chain before Finish #67350
    area-System.Security
  • Fix a PAL filemapping test for macOS arm64 #67352
    arch-arm64, os-mac-os-x, area-PAL-coreclr
  • Disable test45929 for win-arm64 #67363
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable all StructABI tests in pri-0 #67362
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Use ROS<byte> instead of byte[] where it makes sense on S.S.C.Cose #66741
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Publish crossgen as AOT if supported by the target platform #65948
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Reflection Invoke refactoring to support future byref-like and IL emit features #66357
    area-System.Reflection, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • [RyuJIT] Emit shlx, sarx, shrx on x64 and x86 #67182
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Add perf-manual pipeline #67312
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Additional changes to merged test runners #67367
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • [PERF][MAUI] Update maui iOS build sed command #67263
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Nullable annotations for System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #67198
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Make the cross-component build just another invocation of the build-runtime script #67108
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • WIP: switch over JIT/Methodical tests to run using merged wrappers #65597
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Changing the logic for how we deal with RegexOptions.IgnoreCase matching. #67184
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Added test for extracting zip files with invalid characters in Windows #67332
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Use a simpler representation for array addresses after morph #64581
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Improve handling of common Regex sets #67365
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Refactor JsonSerializer metadata reading infrastructure #67183
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • JIT: Refactor call argument representation #67238
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Don't cache commandline in coreclr diagnostics server #63356
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Support immutable types with configuration binding #67258
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • [iOS] Enable some previously skipped tests #65652
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0] Avoid issuing connection attempts for already cancelled requests #67226
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Fix DNS cancellation deadlock #67291
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net, 6.0.x
  • Enable emitting intrinsics for System.Numerics.Vector<T> on arm64 #67125
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Multiple enveloped signatures #67010
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [draft][wasm] JSImport/JSExport prototype #64493
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] improve I64 memory access #64845
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Add additional trace to HttpConnectionPool #66958
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.5
  • FileSystem: MoveDirectory: some improvements. #65132
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [draft] JSImportGenerator #66304
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-jit directory #62843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • [QUIC] Call SendResettableCompletionSource.CompleteException in AbortWrite #67341
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Draft for Min/Max intrinsics xarch (#65625) #65700
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avoid pre-allocating large arrays in some scenarios for Enumerable.Chunk #67210
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Detect systemd when inside a container. #67288
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Change `CrossLoaderAllocatorHash` to not use the GC #67160
    area-TieredCompilation-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [Mono] Fix warnings to enable W4 on Windows. #66710
    os-windows, area-Build-mono
  • Fix System.DirectoryServices.Protocols to work on Linux #67338
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • [mono] Fix static virtual calls to generic methods from gshared code #66739
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • StreamReader sync/async optimizations: ArrayPool, IndexOfAny, ValueStringBuilder #62552
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Sort properties by protection level in structures. #63339
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • Design to support ByRefLike types in Generics #67129
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Managed implementation of NTLM for Android and tvOS #66879
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Added tests for changing a list size being iterated on (#65608) #65615
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Double Vector128 for SpanHelpers.IndexOf(byte,byte,int) on ARM64 #66993
    area-System.Memory
  • Add SubstitutionParser that uses XPath Navigator into NativeAOT #64671
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Added the option to get the compiler version from Crossgen2 #67317
    area-crossgen2-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cannot run Microsoft.Web.LibraryManager.Cli tool with .NET 6/7 SDK's #24648
  • Bash completion function conflict with dotnet-suggest #24645

Closed

  • `dotnet sdk update` support #24461
  • error NETSDK1083: The specified RuntimeIdentifier 'ubuntu.22.04-x64' is not recognized when doing source building package for Ubuntu Jammy 22.04 #24425
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main sdk, .NET 6.0.2xx SDK, validation-sdk-.NET 6.0.2xx SDK #sdk-117260-.NET6.0.2xxSDK #22478
    Backlog
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, sdk, .NET 6.0.1xx SDK, validation-sdk-.NET 6.0.1xx SDK #sdk-115300-.NET6.0.1xxSDK #22192
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main .NET 5 SDK 5.0.2xx, validation-sdk-.NET 5 SDK 5.0.2xx, sdk #sdk-110982-.NET5SDK5.0.2xx #21399
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main sdk, .NET 5 SDK 5.0.4xx, validation-sdk-.NET 5 SDK 5.0.4xx #sdk-110573-.NET5SDK5.0.4xx #21343
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, sdk, .NET 7.0.1xx SDK, validation-sdk-.NET 7.0.1xx SDK #sdk-103310-.NET7.0.1xxSDK #19981
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main sdk, .NET 7.0.1xx SDK, validation-sdk-.NET 7.0.1xx SDK #sdk-102567-.NET7.0.1xxSDK #19862
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, .NET 6, validation-sdk-.NET 6, sdk #sdk-102308-.NET6 #19799

PullRequests

Created

  • Turn test back on. #24661
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Set TargetFrameworkMonikerDisplayName for .NET Standard and .NET Core/.NET5+ projects. #24656
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update ubuntu version #24650
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1693067 #24652
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Adding Package Validation support for cases where PackageId is different than AssemblyName #24439
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1691381 #24395
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Support installing workload pack groups #24630
  • Update the hardcoded net5.0 to the current framework #23881
    Area-Infrastructure
  • SDK integration via BundledNetCoreApp #24550
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Ensure warnings reported from Helix job are included in AzDO job #60512
  • IIncrementalGenerator is not incremental? #60504
  • Add Ability to Embed netmodules #60503

Closed

  • Avoid checking array/stackalloc creation syntax in NullableWalker #60376
    17.3
  • Improving The Hot Reload Feature #57724
    17.2
  • Struct ': this()' initializers should not have definite assignment errors #58790
    Compiler.Next
  • InlineHints `SuppressForParametersThatMatchMethodIntent` does not match local functions #60145
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Adjusting section nesting #60517
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main-vs-deps to main #60515
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Refactoring: Switch from passing compilation as a parameter to using new ConversionsBase.Compilation property instead. #60513
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Utf8StringLiterals
  • Merge compiler features into main-vs-deps #60510
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Utf8StringLiterals, New Feature - CheckedUserDefinedOperators
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #60509
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Support parsing for Unsigned Right Shift operator #60501
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - UnsignedRightShift
  • Introduce a better system for keeping track if a buffer is visible or not in tagging #60500
    Area-IDE
  • Completion textedits cursor #60499
    Area-IDE
  • WIP Pause taggers2 #60497
    Area-IDE
  • Add integration test to flag MEF composition breaks #60496
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1693428 #60495
    auto-merge
  • Fix the KeybindingResetDetector #60494
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge
  • Enable NRT in AbstractSyncNamespaceCodeRefactoringProvider #60492
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Document ROSLYN_TEST_USEDASSEMBLIES #60478
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Add BoundArrayInitialization.IsInferred #60391
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Build official builds of dev17.1 branch #60516
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [17.0 servicing] Update version of Microsoft.VisualStudio.Telemetry #60483
    Area-Infrastructure, Approved to merge
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.3 #60514
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add an aggregate logger for inheritance margin #60493
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.2 #60511
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Move StackTraceAnalyzer over to VirtualCharSequence #60404
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Publish blame heap dumps for new integration tests #60487
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Zero fields before running field initializers in struct constructor with default `: this()` initializer #60471
  • Inline Hints: look for methodkind.localfunction when checking method intent #60486
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to main-vs-deps #60431
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Run 17.0 integration tests against the Release VS instead of Preview #59136
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #60508
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Update Spanish queue to Windows.10.Amd64.Server2022.ES.Open #60506
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Update Spanish queue to Windows.10.Amd64.Server2022.ES.Open #60507
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Simplify how we handle event change notifications in tagging #60488
    Area-IDE

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.2 #60518
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Change project-cone-sync to not dump projects outside of the cone. #60465
    Area-IDE
  • [LSP] Modify semanticTokens `isFinalized` logic #60484
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Implement handling of rename intent #59410
    Area-IDE
  • Support ref field declarations from source and metadata #60416
    Area-Compilers
  • Render exception documentation texts. #56162
    Area-IDE
  • Pause taggers when they are not visible. #60371
    Area-IDE
  • Initial sketch of exposing imports from the semantic model #59533
    Area-Compilers, api-needs-work
  • Check accessibility before offering "Implement interface" codefix #60297
    Area-IDE, Community
  • allow third party codfixers to be run in code cleanup #59631
    Area-IDE
  • Support smart escaping of text when pasting into string expressions. #60036
    Area-IDE
  • Show generator produced diagnostics #60474
    Area-IDE
  • Use provider type name for CodeAction telemetry for code actions... #60480
    Area-IDE, 17.3
  • Fix binder chain for nameof scopes #60459
    Area-Compilers
  • Add support for yield return to CompleteStatementCommandHandler #59683
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Update Language Feature Status.md #60482
    Area-Compilers
  • Add support for unsafe local functions in IDE0062 code fix #59297
    Area-IDE, Community

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • HttpLogging Middleware option to log all headers #40981
  • Why are only GET requests supported for a WebSocket request? #40977
  • Consider trimmer friendly alternatives in Http.Routing that do not initialize a RouteValueDictionary #40975
  • `_framework/blazor-hotreload` 404 when running under subdirectory #40971
    6.0.x
  • --Framework is not consistent with --framework other templates use #40970
    7.0-preview6
  • Disable Minimal API #40968

Closed

  • Exception thrown in RequestDelegateFactory.Create when handling null as a default value for nullable struct type #40774
    7.0-preview5
  • Support accessing `RouteHandlerContext` in `IRouteHandlerFilter` #40724
    7.0-preview4
  • InstallVisualStudio.ps1: aka.ms link doesn't retrieve json? #40976
  • FromBody wouldnt honor System.Text.Json.JsonPropertyName for deserializing #40766
  • Session values not maintained between HttpClient call and normal XHR requests #40089
    Discussions
  • Blazor WebAssemblyPrerendered load images twice #40978
  • The type or namespace name 'class' could not be found in visual studio 17.1.2 #40949
  • dotnet watch run crashes when files get modified #40946
  • Blazor: Auto (implicitly) declare component @ref property #40972
  • Authorize Attribute Error #40797
  • Server shutdown prevents large response from being sent to client during draining #40932
    7.0-preview4
  • Consider trimmer friendly overloads for HttpRequestJsonExtensions / HttpResponseJsonExtensions #40566
    7.0-preview4
  • Filtering SignalR ping messages #40750
  • Undocumented breaking change in default static asset handling .NET 6: Files in wwwroot/ no longer included as content, in publishable zip file #40803

PullRequests

Created

  • Consolidate Blazor Server Template Directives #40984
    area-mvc
  • Support default value for nullable struct parameter #40774 #40983
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Annotate additional assemblies for trimming #40974
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Trim Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting #40969
    area-runtime
  • Fix DelegationRule to work after receiver restarts #40967
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • Adding support for custom JsonConverter(s) when deserializing JSON patches to generic object types #40966
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks

Merged

  • Add RouteHandlerContext as parameter to IRouteHandlerFilter.InvokeAsync #40919
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview3
  • Typo: Update WebApplicationFactoryClientOptions.cs comments #40963
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 7.0-preview3
  • Don't execute test if restore failed #40979
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview3
  • updating showprofile to use correct icon #40980
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview3
  • Fix Kestrel conn close on shutdown while response is writing #40933
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview3

Updated

  • Remove some unused code from installers #40956
    area-infrastructure
  • Add trimming guidance for developers #40902
    area-infrastructure
  • Caching common HttpResults types #40965
    area-web-frameworks
  • HTTP/2 output processing make over #40925
    area-runtime

entry.content:
Issues

Closed

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor Maui error to publish in MAC Host #5727
  • Blazor Maui project calling JS function in Razor component using generated code ExampleJsInterop fail. #5726
  • Blazor Maui project using Razor component with SkiaSharp fail #5725
  • Entry field Enter does not always move to next field #5724
  • DisplayAlert Cancel disables ToolbarItems #5723
  • Verify Blazor Hybrid scenarios on Windows in multi window apps #5722
  • [Android] Alert Dialog With Onscreen Keyboard Open Causes ScrollView Area to Cut Off #5721
  • BindableLayout.SetItemsSource for Grid and ScrollView #5719
  • [Android] Label width doesn't get updated with text #5717
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • [Bug][Shell][Windows] BackButton is not available/shown #5714
  • BlazorWebView MAUI targets don't copy item metadata for *.razor files #5713
  • Negative margin required to place content in TitleBar area when TitleBar is Hidden #5710
  • Voiceover is not reading the search result after performing search operation. #5698
    6.0.300
  • flexaligncontent.center results in a blank screen #5697
  • Add ConverterCulture property on Binding to allow overriding of culture settings #5696
    Future
  • The 'IsEnabled' and 'Color' properties of CheckBox component blocks MAUI application running on Mac #5694
  • [iOS] Calling VisualDiagnostics.RenderAs for Window causes Exception #5693
    6.0.300-rc.2

Closed

  • ApplicationVersion value does not affect Windows App #5137
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • [Bug] Shadow not rendering on layouts #2857
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • [Bug] Scollview scrolled event not triggered #2181
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • [Bug] Bindable Layout Doesn't Update when ItemsSource Changes #1393
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • [Bug] CarouselView on Android causes infinite layout loop #1882
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • [Bug] [Android] CollectionView inside a VerticalStackLayout inside a Shell doesn't render any items #2865
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • File nesting with razor components and CSS files does not work in MAUI solution #5685
  • [iOS] Type x:Double not found in xmlns http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2009/xaml #5531
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Page containing CarouselView doesn't appear #5707
  • [Windows] Wrong initial cursor position in Editor #4089
    6.0.300
  • WinUI Fluent/Windows 11 eval #4236
  • border bug #5567
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • Project using MultiPage migrated from Xamarin faults on MAUI #5622
  • Arm64 Can't Update to newest template #5651
  • App Icon not found error in Android app #5652
  • CheckBox not visible in Windows 11 OS dark theme #5665
  • [Bug] Building to ios-arm64 with Microsoft.Maui.Controls throws "The stream does not support seeking" #2412
    6.0.300-servicing
  • [Bug] Effects does not work #2973
    6.0.300
  • [Bug] PanGestureRecognizer stops firing the PanUpdated event if the target control is removed and re-added to the container #3215
    6.0.300
  • Xml version will be in Android manifest handled as Android version code #3241
    6.0.300-servicing
  • [Net6][Android] Could not activate JNI Handle exception #3296
    6.0.300-servicing
  • [Bug] Visual Studio does not debug Android app with Name property on ActivityAttribute #3407
    6.0.300-servicing
  • View.Measure returns Size.zero #4880
    Future
  • ScrollView VerticalScrollBarVisibility setting stays default #5357
    6.0.300
  • ContentPresenter or View BindableProperty no preloaded view has shown. #5381
    6.0.300
  • [Bug] MAUI - iOS/Mac Localized Resx - multiple publish output files with the same relative path #1855
    6.0.300
  • Linking errors when running a maui app on physical iOS device referencing nuget packages #2179
  • [Bug] ExtendViewIntoTitleBar = true renders differently between Xamarin Forms/UWP and MAUI/WinUI3 #2190
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Unable to download dotnet-install script when behind a proxy server #3209
    6.0.300-servicing
  • ListView throws a IllegalStateException IllegalStateException #3455
    6.0.200-preview.11
  • ArgumentNullException in Resizetizer after adding svg images for splashscreen #4247
    6.0.300
  • iOS Publishing ignores bundle identifier and uses project name instead #4559
    6.0.300
  • Error HRESULT E_FAIL has been returned from a call to a COM component when Windows.Storage.Pickers is using #5443
    6.0.300
  • Essentials Email ComposeAsync Fails on WinUI with Attachment #5353
    Future
  • System.TypeLoadException - Third Party Controls #5678

PullRequests

Created

  • Add MAUI and WPF Blazor Hybrid XAML namespaces #5720
  • Wire up WindowOverlay to the Window Density #5718
    area/tooling ⚙️, partner/ui-tools, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • Fix cake #5712
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix Shapes sizing issues #5709
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, high
  • Fix incorrect clipping using RoundRectangleGeometry #5708
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️
  • Correctly notify changes in the Page BackgroundColor property #5706
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-pages
  • Rename ApplicationId to ApplicationIdGuid for Windows #5695

Merged

  • Improve compatibility with Preview 14 #5711
    area/image :framed_picture:, t/housekeeping ♻︎, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • Default Editor.VerticalTextAlignment to Start #5648
    area/controls 🎮
  • Remove BuildTools as it is part of VS #5705
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • Android reduce singleline usage #5690
  • Comment out shelltests for now #5688
  • Optimize TypeConversionExtensions.ConvertTo #5655
    area/perf 🏎️
  • [android] add more methods to the AOT profile #5682
    area/perf 🏎️, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • Fix up and improve Windows dependencies #5692
    6.0.300-rc.1

Updated

  • Adds Tizen backend #2360
    area/setup 🪄, Future
  • [dualscreen] project/nuget for Surface Duo and other Android foldables #5020
    area/controls 🎮, control-dualscreen, 6.0.300-rc.2

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Change Detection: Exception when adding child to parent entity #27736
  • Support Caching and SqlCacheDependencies as a built-in Feature #27735
  • The IMigrationsModelDiffer.GetDifferences behaves differently on Linux #27734
  • Collation conflict with SaveChangesAsync using Merge #27733
  • Support maximum precision of decimal MsSql in EF #27732

Closed

  • ef-core tool 7.0.0-preview.2.22153.1 command 'dbcontext optimize' creates product version '7.0.0-preview.1.22076.6' annotation #27682
  • System.InvalidOperationException: The connection was not closed. The connection's current state is connecting #27602
  • Enum with EnumToStringConverter always returns 0 in query if cast to another type #27703

PullRequests

Created

  • Add TPC support to update pipeline #27737
